Hu","details":"contract currently assume one buyer account and one seller account, should develop an additional wallet contract and allow new user registrationTodo: to implement multi-sig, time-based escrowTodo: to add a product existence modifier, and a role modifierTodo: the easiest would be to transfer both money and ownership of the product to the agent then to prevent agent from taking everything, agent needs to deposit, which can be slashed if caught faulty","kind":"dev","methods":{"BuyerDeposit(string)":{"details":"Partial payment is sent to the seller, however, can change devdoc.author: Yining Hu
devdoc.details: contract currently assume one buyer account and one seller account, should develop an additional wallet contract and allow new user registrationTodo: to implement multi-sig, time-based escrowTodo: to add a product existence modifier, and a role modifierTodo: the easiest would be to transfer both money and ownership of the product to the agent then to prevent agent from taking everything, agent needs to deposit, which can be slashed if caught faulty

BuyerDeposit(string).details: Partial payment is sent to the seller, however, can change depending on the agreement

constructor.details: before setting up any user wallet, all buyers/sellers use a single buyer/seller address, which are maintained by Beston.

devdoc.title: EscrowService Contract, forked from https://github.com/AleRapchan/escrow-service

AgentApprove(string).notice: Seller can redeem with 2 verifications Achieves the same payment result as BuyerApprove, but requires seller to pay for execution

AgentDeny(string).notice: Buyer can deny the payment upon unsatisfactory verification result or for other reasons.

AgentDenyWithBTK(string).notice: Buyer can deny the payment upon unsatisfactory verification result or for other reasons.

BuyerDeposit(string).notice: Buyer can make a deposit to products on offer

userdoc.notice: Building a single role access control Escrow Service using OpenZeppelin Escrow and RBAC
